title: Ángelo Padilla
text:
Ángelo Alfonso Padilla Barahona (born 5 March 1990) is a <a href="Guatemala">Guatemala</a>n <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who plays for <a href="Asociaci%C3%B3n%20Deportiva%20Carmelita">Carmelita</a> as a striker, in Costa Rica´s First Division.
International career.
Padilla appeared for the <a href="Guatemala%20national%20football%20team">Guatemala national football team</a> in two <a href="2014%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">2014 FIFA World Cup</a> qualifiers.
